title: Exhibits and galleries
text: Posted Oct. 23, 2015 at 2:01 AM Posted Oct. 23, 2015 at 2:01 AM » Social News Mixed Media “Art Play” Class for Adults: No experience needed. All materials provided. 6-week class. Marbletown Community Center, 3564 Main St., Stone Ridge, 6:30-8:30 p.m. every Wed., Oct. 28, Nov. 4, 11 and 18, $160. 338-6503. Orange County Open Studio Tour: Self-guided tours throughout the month of October to artists’ studios from different areas of Orange County. Over 75 Orange County artists and arts organizations are opening their doors to the public to observe working artists, talk to them about their work, see artwork that might not ever be seen otherwise, and to explore their own creativity. Booklets for this free self-guided tour are now available. 11 a.m.-5 p.m. Oct. 24-25 and Oct. 31-Nov. 1. 469-9168. Sip and Paint: Cronomer Valley Fire Dept., 296 N. Plank Road, Newburgh, 7 p.m. Oct. 23, $45. Exhibit openings Ann Street Gallery: “Art + Science,” a group exhibition, through Nov. 28, 104 Ann St., Newburgh. Opening reception, 6:30-8:30 p.m. Oct. 24. Hours: 9 a.m.-5 p.m. Wed. and Thurs.; 11 a.m.-5 p.m. Fri. and Sat. 784-1146. Catskill Art Society: “Logarithmic Scale,” artwork by John T. Dinkey Jr., Oct. 24-Nov. 22, 48 Main St., Livingston Manor. Opening reception, 3-5 p.m. Oct. 24. Hours: 11 a.m.-6 p.m. Sat.; 11 a.m.-3 p.m. Sun.; 11 a.m.-6 p.m. Mon. catskillartsociety.org . Hours: 9 a.m.-5 p.m. Mon.-Fri. 565-2674. Oriole 9: Artists Claire Lambe and Lynne Friedman at Oriole 9, Oct. 14-Nov. 10, 17 Tinker St., Woodstock. Opening reception, 5-7 p.m. Oct. 24.
